onset.Description: Onset (in seconds) of the event, measured from the beginning of the acquisition of the first data point stored in the corresponding task data file.

duration.Description: Duration (in seconds) of the event, measured from the onset of the event.

sample.Description: Onset of the event according to the sampling scheme (frequency).

trial_type.Description: Indicator of type of task action that occurs at the marked time

Levels.PRACTICE_WORD: Word presentation onset (in a practice list).
Levels.PRACTICE_DISTRACT_START: Beginning of math distractor phase (in a practice list).
Levels.PRACTICE_DISTRACT_END: End of math distractor phase (in a practice list).
Levels.PRACTICE_REC_START: Recall phase begins (in a practice list).
Levels.PRACTICE_REC_END: Recall phase ends (in a practice list).
Levels.ORIENT: Fixation preceding presentation of word list.
Levels.REC_WORD: Recalled word, onset of speech (during free recall).

response_time.Description: Time (in seconds) between onset of recall phase and recall (for recalls and vocalizations), or between onset of problem on screen and response (for math problems).

stim_file.Description: Location of wordpool file containing words presented in WORD events.

subject.Description: The string identifier of the subject, e.g. R1001P.

list.Description: Word list (1-24) during which the event occurred. Trial <= 0 indicates practice list.

item_name.Description: The word being presented or recalled in a WORD or REC_WORD event.

category.Description: Semantic cateogry of word presented or recalled in a WORD or REC_WORD event.

serialpos.Description: The order position of a word presented in an WORD event.

test.Description: Math problem with form X + Y + Z = ?  Stored in list [X, Y, Z].

answer.Description: Participant answer to problem with form X + Y + Z = ?  Note this is not necessarily the correct answer.
